Package com.cosmicraiders

Class Spawner

java.lang.Object
com.cosmicraiders.Spawner
public class Spawner extends Object
A Spawner creates objects in the game: aliens, alien lasers and fighter lasers. Its attributes also track the timing of past and future spawns.

  • Constructor Summary

    Spawner(GameScreen gameScreen)
    The constructor gets a reference to the GameScreen in order to refer back to it.

  • Constructor Details

    • Spawner

      public Spawner(GameScreen gameScreen)
      The constructor gets a reference to the GameScreen in order to refer back to it.
      Parameters:
      gameScreen - the main game environment

  • Method Details

    • handleSpawning

      public void handleSpawning()
      Checks the timing and spawns asteroids, aliens, and alien lasers if conditions are met.

    • spawnAsteroid

      public void spawnAsteroid()
      Spawns an asteroid and adds it to the asteroids array. This method ensures a steady stream of asteroids falling from the top of the screen towards the bottom. Asteroids are Circles, not Rectangles. Most other objects are Rectangles.

    • spawnAlien

      public void spawnAlien()
      Spawns an alien and adds it to the aliens array which moves diagonally. The alien is a Rectangle for collision purposes. It shoots green lasers. This method can be expanded to cause more than one alien to spawn, move and shoot.

    • spawnAlienLaser

      public void spawnAlienLaser(float x, float y)
      Spawns an alien laser starting from the bottom middle of the alien ship sprite. Sets lastAlienShootTime in order to set the interval between shots. Adds the laser to an Array to be rendered.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal coordinate of the alien ship that shoots
      y - the vertical coordinate of the alien ship that shoots

    • spawnFighterLaser

      public void spawnFighterLaser()
      Spawns a fighter laser starting from the bottom middle of the fighter ship sprite. Sets lastFighterShootTime in order to set the interval between shots. Adds the laser to an Array to be rendered.

    • attemptPowerUpSpawn

      public void attemptPowerUpSpawn(float x, float y)
